channel.title: Comments on: Three decades of Sonic Youth

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: really. i could not disagree more.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description:
really? the eternal?
well, it's certainly the best sonic youth's done since murray street. but i'd say the eternal's on par with sonic nurse: a few jams; the occasional stinker; lots of filler.
item.content:encoded:
really? the eternal?

well, it’s certainly the best sonic youth’s done since murray street. but i’d say the eternal’s on par with sonic nurse: a few jams; the occasional stinker; lots of filler.
